last_episode_to_air.name: The Mole
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tuca's in trouble and Bertie has to dive deep to understand how to help her! Speckle does some wild stuff too! I don't want to spoil it, but oh man, it's truly nuts!

name: Tuca & Bertie
overview: Free-spirited toucan Tuca and self-doubting song thrush Bertie are best friends – and birds – who guide each other through life's ups and downs.

episodes.name: The Sugar Bowl
episodes.overview: It's the end of an era as Bertie's boyfriend moves in and her best friend Tuca moves out ... into the apartment right above her.

episodes.name: The Promotion
episodes.overview: Bertie wants to climb the ladder at Conde Nest but encounters sexual harassment. Enter Tuca with a plan to help her BFF get what she wants.

episodes.name: The Deli Guy
episodes.overview: While Tuca’s out on a hot date with her crush, Bertie tries to spice things up at home -- with a little bird porn.

episodes.name: The Sex Bugs
episodes.overview: An anxious Bertie skips work to avoid a presentation, then accompanies Tuca on a mission to buy over-the-counter creams.

episodes.name: Plumage
episodes.overview: Bertie's starting her apprenticeship at the bakery, but first -- it's Self-Care Saturday! Tuca and Speckle visit Tuca's aunt in the Beakshires.

episodes.name: The Open House
episodes.overview: Bertie and Speckle consider buying a house, a big commitment that throws Bertie into a tailspin. Tuca brings home a forever friend.

episodes.name: Yeast Week
episodes.overview: Tuca needs medical attention, stat -- but she's terrified to see a doctor. An elite baking expo gives Bertie the chance to bring "crünts" to the world.

episodes.name: The New Bird
episodes.overview: Bertie branches out and bonds with an eager young apprentice at Pastry Pete's. Elsewhere, without her bestie, Tuca feels a little bit lost.

episodes.name: The Jelly Lakes
episodes.overview: An impromptu road trip takes Tuca and Bertie to Bertie’s old summer camp -- a faraway place that dredges up painful memories.

episodes.name: SweetBeak
episodes.overview: ’Tis the season for fighting the pastry-archy when Tuca urges Bertie to open her own bakery. But can they deliver the goods in time for Molting Day?

episodes.name: Bird Mechanics
episodes.overview: Tuca and Bertie are both looking for their perfect match. Bertie needs to see the best therapist as quickly as possible, and Tuca finds a clever way to jump-start her dating life.

episodes.name: Planteau
episodes.overview: Everybody's going to Planteau for some bachelor/bachelorette weekend fun! Hopefully Tuca's sobriety and Bertie's social anxiety won't get in the way of a good time.

episodes.name: Kyle
episodes.overview: Bertie hits a wall at work and decides to channel her inner bird/bro, while Tuca's passions steer her into a high-octane new job. Will our gals wield their new powers responsibly? No.

episodes.name: Nighttime Friend
episodes.overview: Tuca deals with her nightly insomnia and loneliness by exploring Bird Town after hours. Bertie handles an IBS attack and Speckle has a new pedometer watch!

episodes.name: Vibe Check
episodes.overview: Bertie's vibrator is giving her intrusive-yet-titillating thoughts, it must be broken... or maybe it's her bed... or her brain? Tuca wonders if her new friendship could be something more. Speckle's reeeally into his new video game.

episodes.name: The Moss
episodes.overview: A new landlord? A rent increase? Not today, Gentrifier. Tuca & Bertie battle a mysterious new apartment manager while Speckle races to finish building his dream house.

episodes.name: Sleepovers
episodes.overview: Tuca is caught up in the love bubble of her hot new romance, while Bertie reminisces about their friendship. Bertie also buys a LOT of milk in this episode.

episodes.name: Corpse Week
episodes.overview: Happy Cadaveri! It's Corpse Week and the gang are visiting Tuca and Bertie's families for the holidays. What's spookier, all the morbid imagery or the complicated family dynamics?

episodes.name: The Dance
episodes.overview: Bertie hasn't seen Tuca in weeks and she isn't sure whether to give her space or fight for their friendship! Some drama goes down at the annual Bird Town Carnival.

episodes.name: The Flood
episodes.overview: Once upon a time, Bird Town was overwhelmed by a natural disaster. While the city is under siege, Bertie helps Tuca deal with some personal ghosts and unpack a big issue in their friendship.

episodes.name: Leveling Up
episodes.overview: Tuca's got a new job AND love interest, Speckle's making a big splash at work, and Bertie's barely treading water… until she has the chance to prove herself, at a cost!

episodes.name: The Pain Garden
episodes.overview: Tuca is forced to confront a mysterious chronic health issue, and Bertie takes a liking to Tuca's beau... accidentally.

episodes.name: The One Where Bertie Gets Eaten by a Snake
episodes.overview: Bertie gets eaten by a snake!!!

episodes.name: Leaf Raking
episodes.overview: A very sporty episode! Tuca juggles lust and sexual dysfunction, while Bertie and Speckle try their hands at parenting.

episodes.name: Salad Days
episodes.overview: Yeast Week is here again! Is Bertie's new mentor an improvement over Pastry Pete? Tuca and Speckle wrangle a rowdy duck into submission.

episodes.name: Screech Leeches
episodes.overview: Ahhh! The girls revisit Bertie's spookiest memory: a high school friendship that got hella intense!

episodes.name: A Very Speckle Episode
episodes.overview: Being an architect's tough, and Speckle's thiiiiiis close to losing it. Tuca dips into astrology and goes HARD.

episodes.name: Fledging Day
episodes.overview: Bertie might have some mommy issues! Tuca coaches Speckle through a tough transitional life stage.

episodes.name: Somebirdy's Getting Married
episodes.overview: There's a wedding in Bird Town, and that means being forced to mingle with ex-lovers while dressed up real fancy!

episodes.name: The Mole
episodes.overview: Tuca's in trouble and Bertie has to dive deep to understand how to help her! Speckle does some wild stuff too! I don't want to spoil it, but oh man, it's truly nuts!
